results.title: Live Laugh Love, Heart Sign, Love Sign, Inspirational Sign, Anniversary, Wedding Gift, Heart Banner Sign, Valentine's Day, Housewarming Gift
results.description:
This little wall sign has a fun message on it and would look great in any home. Would also make a nice gift.

It is made out of wood and is in the shape of a banner. It's been decorated with soft pink and white colored scrapbook paper that was applied by using some Mod Podge and then sanded around the edges. A pink painted wooden heart overlay is glued to the front which includes white vinyl lettering "Live Laugh Love". 

A sheer pink ribbon is attached making it easy for hanging on the wall. The wood part measures 7 inches tall by 5 inches wide and is about 1/2 inch thick. Total height including ribbon is about 10 inches tall.

results.title: Live more worry less, Print, poster, quote
results.description:
See our other pre made Quotes and Definitions here - https://etsy.me/3qVZN2k


📜DISCOUNT CODES📜

Buy 4 items and use code BUY30 at checkout and receive a 30% discount
Buy 5 items and use code BUY35 at checkout and receive a 35% discount
Buy 6 items and use code BUY40 at checkout and receive a 40% discount



DO WE SELL DIGITAL PRINTS?

📜 We are UNABLE to offer/sell DIGITAL DOWNLOADS(We offer digtal products on custom orders in the link above)
We only offer PRINTS for sale.


📜 Due to monitor differences actual colours may vary slightly from what appears online.
📜 The image sizes are not to scale. Solely for illustration purposes only.


FRAMES

📜 All our products comes UNFRAMED. This is more cost effective for our customers so we can keep our prices down. You can purchase frames online or you can take it to frame shop to get framed. You can cut and fit your frame size if need to...

📜 Please note that the FRAME HERE IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE SALE, it’s for illustrative purposes only.

📜 I recommend the use of a frame and frame mounts for the perfect looking picture.

📜 We do not sell any frames, You can find similar frame on home furnishing stores or here on Etsy 


WHAT MATERIAL WE USE?

📜 We believe in QUALITY. We use very high top quality paper and ink for our products so we can give you the best quality of art prints and you can pass it to next generations as collectible. The come with a lifetime warranty on them not to be faded.
That make us unique. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED


📜 PAPER print A5-A4-A3 size printed on NON TEXTURED Acid free High Quality thick 300 GSM ultra white German milled paper. A5 and A4 size comes in FLAT HARD BACK ENVELOPE . A3 and A2 sizes are mailed in hard POSTAL TUBES.

SIZES

• A6 (105mm x 148mm) (4.1inch x 5.8inch)
• A5 (148mm x 210mm) (5.8inch x 8.3inch)
• A4 (210mm x 297mm) (8.3inch x 11.7inch)
• A3 (297mm x 420mm) (11.7inch x 16.5inch)
• A2 (420mm x 594mm) (16.5inch x 23.4inch)
• A1 (594mm x 841mm) (23.4inch x 33.1inch)
• A0 (1189mm x 841mm)(46.8inch x 33.1inch)


DO WE ACCEPT RETURNS / EXCHANGES ?

📜 You should READ the shop policies and listing description (specially about printing materials, dimensions and delivery times ) thoroughly before placing an order. Otherwise responsibility will belong to you.

📜 We accept return in certain conditions BUT THERE WILL BE NO PACKAGE AND POSTAGE REFUNDED.
Buyers are responsible for return shipping costs. If the item is not returned in its original condition, the buyer is responsible for any loss in value.

The time I need to prepare an order for shipping varies. For details, see individual items. But we usually dispatch same day if ordered before 2pm UK time. Unless during the holiday season. Dispatch day can be changed, but you will get notified by email of the new dispatch day.


ESTIMATED SHIPPING TIMES

+Mexico: 9-30 business days

+Russia: 3-30 business days

+United Kingdom: 1-5 business days

+North America: 3-30 business days

+Europe: 3-30 business days

+Australia, New Zealand and Oceania: 3-30 business days

+Rest of the world may vary from 1 week to 30 business days

📜 I'll do my best to meet these shipping estimates, but cannot guarantee them.
POSTAL STRIKES, CHRISTMAS, NATIONAL HOLIDAYS and CUSTOMS STOPPAGE can delay postal times and extend the latest expected day of delivery.

If you have not received it in 30 BUSINESS days, please send us an e-mail or contact us in the Etsy section “Contact the seller”.

📜 As you know, 30 BUSINESS days is a generally accepted time frame for international orders on all international trade web site. "Business days" are classified as Monday to Friday excluding weekends.


POSTAL SERVICE AND TRACKING

Actual delivery times will depend on the shipping method you choose.
There is free standard shipping or tracked/signature on delivery option
to choose from, there is NO TRACKING WITH STANDARD POSTAL SERVICE.
We have a ROYAL MAIL account and get notified when a package is delivered.


CUSTOMS AND IMPORT TAX

📜 Buyers are responsible for any customs and import taxes that may apply. We dont take any responsibility for delays due to customs.

results.title: Lick Laugh Love | Printable Wall Art | Digital Download | Printable Poster | Simple Wall Art | Simple Digital Downloads | Poster Prints |
results.description:
Simple, fun, affordable wall art to help decorate your space!

Printable Wall Art | Digital Download | Printable Poster | Simple Wall Art | Simple Digital Downloads | Poster Prints |

This print is part of the Dogs & Donation collection! $1.00 from each sale of this print will go to an animal rescue organization. Check out the shop's Instagram to see the current featured organization!
Instagram: @simplebyshanon

PDF and JPG files will be available for download once purchased.
You'll receive two file sizes in both JPG and PDF (four files total). File sizes are 18x24 inches and 16x20 inches.

If you’re not able to print at home I recommend using a store like Walgreens or Costco.


Disclaimers:
No refunds on digital downloads
Not for commercial/resale use
Colors may vary depending on monitor settings
If there are any issues with the product please let me know and I’m happy to help figure it out!

Common FAQs:

What is a digital download?

A digital download is an electronic form of acquiring a file. Once you purchase the file, you’ll instantly receive the downloadable files. Nothing will be physically sent to you - instead it will immediately be available on your device.

Why would I want one?

So many reasons! Digital downloads are an affordable and convenient way to decorate and refresh your space. No waiting for shipping, paying extra for delivery fees, or having to guess about the quality of the product you’re getting. You get instant access to the files once payment is confirmed, so you’re able to experience your purchase immediately.

From there it’s yours to customize to fit your space. Want to put it in an antique gold frame? Go for it. What if you prefer a classic black framed look? Great! One you download the file the choice is yours on how to display the art.

How do I print it?

There’s three common options to print.

- At home. Use your own home printer to print out the designs.
- Local print shop. Do a quick google search to find a local print shop near you. Typically I’ve used Walgreens in the past, but there’s no shortage of options. From there they’ll be able to provide instructions on the best ways to print from them.
- Online print shop. Send your files to an online print shop and they’ll be able to mail you your prints.

If you’re having trouble figuring out the best way to print, send me a message and I’m happy to help out.


What if I don’t want to print the design for wall art?

You don’t have to. Again that’s part of the beauty of a digital download! You can set it as the background to your computer or mobile phone, upload it to print on a different product you had in mind, or any other idea you have for personal use!

Anything else?

Remember when you shop on Etsy you’re supporting someone’s dream and hard work. They’ve put thought and care into the products they’ve created, and every sale means so much to them. Supporting small shops may seem like a simple thing to do, but that simple action creates a big impact.


Any other questions? Just ask!

results.title: Alive Ahaha Fuck Shirt | Tik Tok
results.description:
>>>>FABRICATION<<<<
Solids: 100% Cotton
Heather: 52% Cotton, 48% Polyester
Triblend: 70% Cotton, 15% Polyester, 15% Rayon

**COVID-19 POLICY CHANGES**
• USPS has been experiencing delays.
• USPS delivery dates are estimates and not guarantees.
• I cannot guarantee delivery dates. I will not issue a refund for packages not delivered by estimated delivery day.
• Standard First Class shipping does not come with insurance. If you would like insurance on your package, an upgrade to Priority shipping with insurance is an option. Please send me a message for this option.
• Euphoria&Co.is not responsible for lost, stolen, or delayed packages.
• I will not be taking rush orders at this time.

>>>>PRODUCTION 🔨<<<<
-- Due to COVID-19 making it hard to obtain supplies the current production time is 1-2 weeks, not including weekends or holidays (THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE SHIPPING TIME). --
• RUSH ORDER: Please send me a message if you need your order by a certain date. I can try my best to accommodate your request. A rush order fee may be applied.
• Please understand that I do not keep an inventory of all materials and may need to place my own orders to fulfill your purchase. This will factor in to production time. 
• I place my shirt orders on Mondays in which they are delivered to me the same week. If you order on a Wednesday I will not order your shirt until the following Monday. Please keep this in mind if you need your order by a certain date!

>>>>SHIPPING 📦<<<<
Please note the US Postal Service does not guarantee deliveries: 
• Standard shipping is USPS First Class Mail and takes 3-5 business days from the ship date. Free with purchase.
• USPS Priority Mail takes 2-3 business days from the ship date. Starts at $7.50
• USPS Priority Mail Express takes 1-2 business days from the ship date. Starts at $26.35
• If you would like to upgrade to Priority or Express, please contact me BEFORE placing your order I will have to create you a new listing for the extra shipping charges. 
- Depending on the weight of the item purchased your order may already be shipping Priority. 
- Understand that upgrading your shipping only speeds up the shipping process and not the production time.. please message me if you need something on a certain date and I will do my best to accommodate your request. 

>>>>CARE INSTRUCTIONS 🚰<<<<
For best results of keeping the garment in tact fully, it is best to turn garment INSIDE OUT and wash in COLD water using a MILD detergent, on a GENTLE cycle. DO NOT use bleach or fabric softeners as these can damage the design. Dry on LOW heat or air dry. Please iron inside out. I do not recommend using an iron directly on the design area.

>>>>RETURN POLICY ❌<<<<
Due to the custom/made to order nature of our products ALL SALES ARE FINAL. NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.
• Please be sure to read the entire listing fully and measure before ordering. If you are not sure, it is best to size up. 
• If there is a problem with your order, please contact me within THREE DAYS of delivery and I will do my best to fix the issue.

>>>>DISCLAIMER 📃<<<<
• By submitting an order and payment you have read and understand all terms listed above.
• All items in the shop are hand crafted by yours truly and made to order. Items may be slightly different from the listing pictures as each item is individually created at the time of purchase.
• Allow for color variance as all monitors read differently.
• I use shirts from brands such as Bella+Canvas, Comfort Colors, Next Level, Gildan, and LAT Apparel. Regardless of which brand is pictured you may receive one from any of these brands. Sizes are often out of stock for certain brands and colors and I will order shirts accordingly. I stand behind the quality of these products and ensure they are the of the best. If you have a preference, please let me know and I will do my best to accommodate.

>>>>COPYRIGHT ©<<<<
Euphoria&Co.'s items are protected by US copyright laws. You may not manipulate, copy, alter, or resell any images, products or content in this shop without specific permission from Euphoria&Co.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Dream Pastel Pop Wall Art | Digital Download, Printable Wall Art, Positive Quotes
results.description:
~ BUNDLE AND SAVE, USE CODE BUNDLE25 FOR 25% OFF ANY PURCHASE OF 2 OR MORE DIGITAL DESIGNS ~

Decorate your dorm, bedroom, nursery, or living space with fun and trendy wall art in soothing pastel colors to add positivity to your day. White text reads “LIVE LAUGH LOVE DREAM” with pop art style peachy outline over pastel green background. 

Once payment has cleared, you will be able to download the JPEG file in four sizes: 16x20in, 11x14in, 8x10in, and 4x6in. These are all standard picture frame sizes, allowing you too easily frame your print. 

You can print from home, or send to a printer like Staples or Shutterfly. We recommend printing on paper with a luster finish, but that’s just a matter of personal preference. Please keep in mind that all printers render color differently, and paper quality will also affect the quality of your print. We are not responsible for final print quality. However, if you’re having issues, send us a message and we’ll see how we can help. 

Make sure to check out the rest of the Pastel Pop Wall Quotes collection for a one stop shop for cohesive wall art that will brighten your day. 

FULL CUSTOMIZATION AVAILABLE. Like the quote but not the color? Want a size that’s not listed? Have a quote you want in this style? Send us a message, we’d be happy to help you design the wall art of your dreams. Pricing will depend on the complexity of the request. 

Due to the digital nature of the file refunds are not available once payment has cleared. If you have any questions, please ask BEFORE ordering. 

Digital downloads are for PERSONAL USE ONLY. Prints made from Your Girl Kath, LLC’s digital downloads may NOT BE SOLD. Digital file may not be shared with anyone outside of your household.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Set of 10 Buttons 1 Inch Pinback Buttons 1" Pins or Magnets
results.description:
Set of 10 various Live, Love, Laugh themed 1" mini buttons. You will receive 10 buttons randomly selected from the assortment shown in pic.

1" diameter mini buttons (2.54 cm) available in Pin Backs, Flat Backs, Hollow Backs, Magnets
*See additional pictures to view back options & demonstration of button size*

Description of back options (price will vary):
• Pin Backs: Pins on back for wearing on clothing.
• Flat Backs: Flat plastic back. Typically used for crafts. (no pins)
• Hollow Backs: Hollow button shell. Typically used for crafts. (no pins)
• Fridge Magnets: Magnets for fridge/filing cabinet, etc. (not for wearing)

""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

Buttons are great for so many uses! Party favors, rewards, stocking stuffers, pin it on your purse, backpack, hat, etc! Also, a great alternative to bottle caps.

* Images are printed by a color laser printer on premium white paper
* Hand pressed with a professional grade button machine
* Mylar cover keeps it water resistant (however, it is not water proof)

Want a different quantity or want to mix and match sets? Custom orders are welcome! 

***Due to computer monitor differences, colors may vary slightly.***

Please note: Buttons are considered small items and may potentially become a choking hazard and also contain sharp points or strong magnets. Please do not leave children unattended in our accessories.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Custom Light Switch Plate Cover HOME DECOR *Various Type Covers Available*
results.description:
Thank you for checking out our custom made light switch covers! Our covers are made here in the US! We use the art of decoupage on all of our light switch covers making them durable and easy to wipe down with a damp cloth. We also include screws in each order! Our light switch covers are made to order and are shipped out within 3-5 business days along with tracking so you know where your item is at all times! We make all type of covers with any image you could dream of! If you do not see a type of cover that you would like listed on our page, please feel free to send us a message for any custom requests! Below is a list of the types of covers that we offer!
If you would like to purchase additional covers please message us and we can invoice you accordingly!
*Single Toggle 
*Electrical Outlets 
*Double Toggle 
*Triple Toggle 
*Single Rocker 
*Double Rocker

results.title: Live Love Laugh Heart Necklace | Inspirational Jewelry | Gifts for Aunt | Words of Wisdom Quotes | Gifts for Friend
results.description:
This classic Live Love Laugh Quote Necklace is perfect in your search for a special gift and is delivered on a pretty purple heart pendant decorated with mod hearts & flowers and adorned with a Swarovski White pearl and Lavender crystal.

Pendant is a 1 inch heart-shaped domed glass tile in a silver plated setting and comes with a 24" silver alloy chain with lobster clasp. 

Art is set under the clear crystal tile. I only use genuine Swarovski pearls and crystals

INSPIRATION:
Whimsical and fun designs are inspired by Rose Crescent neighbors Hannah & Summer. The energetic twins love art, dancing and hanging with their friends. When they’re not on the set of their upcoming new movie, or at school, they volunteer at our local animal shelter.

Inspiration words and quotes, hand-drawn hearts, butterflies and smiling birds adorn these sweet and whimsical bracelets and pendants – perfect to give as gifts for special young ladies and for the young at heart!

results.title: LIVE Well LAUGH Often LOVE Much - Wall Stickers - Motivational Quotes - inspirational quote - Live Laugh Love Wall Quote - Wall Art Decal
results.description:
LIVE LAUGH LOVE Wall Quote Stickers Home Art Decal Vinyl Removable 
******************** Size ******************
Small: 56cm (H) X 28cm (W) 
Medium: 75cm (H) X 40cm (W) 
Large: 105cm (H) X 56cm (W) 
 
Note: Please send if you have any special requirement . You can email us.
*****************************************
*****************************************
Visit for more Quote wall stickers
https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/JRDecal?section_id=13191074&ref=shopsection_leftnav_5
*****************************************
********************************************
Item Overview:

    Hand Made
    Made to Order
    Materials:
    5 years Vinyl paper 
    Paper Application Tape
    Made in a Smoke-Free environment
    Eco friendly 
    and it's harmless non-toxic, it safe for children's bedrooms
    Complete 'how to apply' instruction will be provided

 Where to Use:

    Glasses/Mirror
    Painted Wall
    Wooden Surface
    Tiles
    Aluminium Surface
    Plastics
    Smooth Wall paper
    It's 100% removable, will no damage to paintwork/wall,
    Not Reusable

Note: Not removable from wall papers. All surface needs to be clean and dry.

How to apply Vinyl wall Sticker:

Step 01: Clean the surface with a dry cloth. Then mark the desired place

Step 02: Place the wall sticker on a plain table or hard surface than smooth out the backing paper using ID card/bank card or plastic squeegee, so that no bubble left.

Step 03: Carefully remove the backing paper at the flat angel to ensure that the decal remains to adhere to the application tape.


Step 04: Affix the decal to the desired location with the adhesive side facing the surface

Step 05: Smooth out the application tape using plastic squeegee or card, make sure the sticker is properly applied to the surface

Step 06: Carefully peel off the application tape from the upper right corner at the flat angle. Peel completely. If any part is not affixed to the wall properly, press them using the squeegee.

Step 07: Done! See your room Wall after apply all the stickers you have.

Tips:

    clean the surface properly with a dry cloth
    measure and mark the desired location
    Very suitable for plain wall, wood, steel, mirror, and glass 

Warnings:

    Please do not apply wall stickers if your wall is newly painted. Wait at least 3 - 4 weeks.
    Clean properly, no dust or grease oil should remain on the surface
    Do not apply on your wall paper. It will damage your wall paper when remove!

 
How to place an order

    Choose the Quantity you want to Buy from the menu
    Click on "Add to Cart"
    Add your personalized details on seller note (for personalized product only).
    Add your delivery address and payment details
    Seat back and relax!! 

Shipping Information:

We are offering free shipping for the UK.

The product will be dispatched next working day after your Purchase and Delivery is estimated to be within 3 to 5 working days after the Dispatched.

We offer next day guarantee delivery which is available on checkout.

International shipping:

International Shipping also available with tracking for the price please look at postage and payment option. International estimate delivery will be 15 to 20 working days depending on your local customs clearance. All tracking ID will be automatically updated when available.

Secured payment:
Immediate Payment is required via Paypal as this is the Safest method for paying eBay orders.  



<<<<<<<<<<<<<<Feedback>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Please do not leave a negative feedback as a way to communicate. Any rating given to a seller can neither be changed nor modified. So better communicate for faster resolution to any disputes.

results.title: Live Love Teach - Funny Sarcastic Teacher Inspirational Shirt - UNISEX Black Graphic Tee
results.description:
Live Love Teach - Funny Sarcastic Teacher Inspirational Shirt - UNISEX Black Graphic Tee

Featuring East & Oak’s original design this oh-so-soft unisex lightweight, jersey shirt is sure to be your new favorite. Whether it be lounging at home, traveling, or a night out with friends this shirt has that great lived-in feel and expresses your unique style.  

Unisex Crew Neck & V-Neck Shirts
= 100% combed and ring-spun cotton*
= Printed with eco-friendly inks
= Printed and shipped from the USA for US residents
= Printed and shipped from Canada for Canadian residents
= Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
= Side-seamed
* Heathered colors are a cotton/poly blend

Unisex Sizing
All our shirts are unisex. Please refer to our sizing chart included in the listing for details on measurements. If you prefer a looser fit, order one size up or check out our plus sized listings. 

Shipping & Turnaround Time
Every order that we receive is made custom for you! It takes 1-3 business days to process your order prior to shipping. 
Shipping Times in Canada and the US are approximately 3-5 business days AFTER PROCESSING TIME OF 1-3 BUSINESS DAYS. If we are experiencing longer shipping times due to carriers being stretched we will let you know. 

Caring and Washing instructions
= Wash item inside out in cold water
= Do not bleach, do not dry clean, do not iron directly on the design.

Check out some of our other listings that you might like:
Alexis Rose - "Love that Journey for Me" T-Shirt
https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/961403121/love-that-journey-for-me-alexis-rose?ref=shop_home_feat_4&frs=1

Please feel free to message us with any questions on materials, shipping times or sizes.
When you purchase from a small retailer you help make someone’s dreams come true. Thank you so much for your support!

results.title: Every Love Story Is Beautiful, but ours is my favorite -  Wall Saying Vinyl Decal Graphic 30"x13" Home Decor
results.description:
This wall decal will add a lovely touch to any room in your home.

This Vinyl Wall Decal is 30"x13" - (40x17" shown in product image). See our other sizes to see what is right for you. We offer small, medium and large. Custom sizes are also available.

You can choose any color from our color chart for this decal.

If no colors are chosen, colors displayed will be produced.
    
This is easy to install and comes with application instructions and an application squeegee. Can be removed without damaging walls.
    
Sticker Hog Vinyl Wall Decals are great for decorating interior walls. These decals will last for many years. We guarantee satisfaction.
